mean_cn: v. 使遭受（损伤、痛苦等），使承担（负担等）
mean_en: to cause someone to experience or be affected by (something unpleasant or harmful)
word_etyma: in进入+flict打击→进入打斗→导致痛苦
short_phrase: The criminals want to inflict harm.
sentence: Violent criminals wish to inflict harm on others.
sentence_trans: 暴力罪犯想对他人造成伤害。
